profiles: Experience Senior Financial Analyst GoPro January 2014  – Present (1 year 8 months) San Mateo, CA Calculate and book monthly bonus plan accrual by verifying and validating source payroll data as well as partnering with Finance to analyze corporate performance. Account reconciliation ownership. Assist AP and merchant teams as needed. Ad hoc analysis as requested. Monthly journal entries and analysis of expense and headcount for management and business partner review. Reconciliation of division's monthly operating expenses to budget.
